channel.title: CVE Feed for StylemixThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for StylemixThemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-46207|2024-08-28T15:38:57.255Z -- stylemixthemes -- motors%20%E2%80%93%20car%20dealer%2C%20classifieds%20%26%20listing
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in StylemixThemes Motors – Car Dealer, Classifieds & Listing.This issue affects Motors – Car Dealer, Classifieds & Listing: from n/a through 1.4.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-4097|2024-08-01T20:33:52.142Z -- stylemixthemes -- cost%20calculator%20builder
item.description: The Cost Calculator Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the SVG upload feature in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.67 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4787|2024-08-01T20:55:08.734Z -- stylemixthemes -- cost%20calculator%20builder%20pro
item.description: The Cost Calculator Builder PRO for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary email sending vulnerability in versions up to, and including, 3.1.75. This is due to insufficient limitations on the email recipient and the content in the 'send_pdf' and the 'send_pdf_front' functions which are reachable via AJAX. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to send emails with any content to any recipient.

item.title: CVE-2024-4789|2024-08-01T20:55:09.397Z -- stylemixthemes -- cost%20calculator%20builder%20pro
item.description: Cost Calculator Builder Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery in all versions up to 3.1.72, via the send_demo_webhook() function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to make web requests to arbitrary locations originating from the web application and can be used to query and modify information from internal services.

item.title: CVE-2024-37090|2024-07-09T09:14:27.844Z -- stylemixthemes -- masterstudy%20elementor%20widgets
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in StylemixThemes Masterstudy Elementor Widgets, StylemixThemes Consulting Elementor Widgets.This issue affects Masterstudy Elementor Widgets: from n/a through 1.2.2; Consulting Elementor Widgets: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-37091|2024-07-02T14:38:54.301Z -- stylemixthemes -- consulting%20elementor%20widgets
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in StylemixThemes Consulting Elementor Widgets allows OS Command Injection.This issue affects Consulting Elementor Widgets: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-37089|2024-06-24T14:18:57.355Z -- stylemixthemes -- consulting%20elementor%20widgets
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in StylemixThemes Consulting Elementor Widgets allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Consulting Elementor Widgets: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-4787|2024-06-19T03:12:28.211Z -- stylemixthemes -- cost%20calculator%20builder%20pro
item.description: The Cost Calculator Builder PRO for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary email sending vulnerability in versions up to, and including, 3.1.75. This is due to insufficient limitations on the email recipient and the content in the 'send_pdf' and the 'send_pdf_front' functions which are reachable via AJAX. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to send emails with any content to any recipient.

item.title: CVE-2024-35677|2024-06-11T14:44:54.534Z -- stylemixthemes -- megamenu
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in StylemixThemes MegaMenu allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects MegaMenu: from n/a through 2.3.12.

item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in StylemixThemes Consulting allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Consulting: from n/a through 6.5.6.
